repositories.author: openebs
repositories.name: openebs
repositories.description: OpenEBS is containerized storage for containers integrated tightly into K8S and other environments and based on distributed block storage and containerization of storage control. OpenEBS derives intent from K8S and other YAML or JSON such as per container QoS SLAs, tiering and replica policies, and more. OpenEBS is EBS API compliant as well.
